channel.title: traefik on Aaron Ogle
channel.description: Recent content in traefik on Aaron Ogle

item.title: Rocket.Chat + Kubernetes + Traefik = :heart:
item.description: You could say I’ve been a docker / container fanboy for a while now… I started working with containers in a couple of previous jobs. Primarily only as aids for the build process or for maintaining the same environment between dev and production. But at my current job I got the opportunity to really go all in. At Rocket.Chat we wanted to build a cloud offering to allow people to quickly and easily deploy Rocket.
